title: Colorado State Income Tax Calculator | Authoritative, Accessible & Fast

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: AGI = \max\{0,\; \text{Gross Income} - \text{Pre-tax Deductions}\} D = \begin{cases} \text{StdDed}_{(year,status)} & \text{if Standard} \\ \text{Itemized Amount} & \text{if Itemized} \end{cases} TI = \max\{0,\; AGI - D\} Tax_{pre} = TI \times r_{(year)} Tax_{owed} = \max\{0,\; Tax_{pre} - \text{Credits}\} \text{Effective Rate} = \begin{cases} \frac{Tax_{owed}}{\text{Gross Income}} & \text{if Gross} > 0 \\ 0 & \text{otherwise} \end{cases}

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
